Jen Lovegrove

novaricollective.com.au

Hi Jen,

I hope you're doing well.

Just to provide a bit of context as we look into this — the "Trial Discount" item appears due to how the site is currently set up. It’s part of the process used to securely capture the client’s credit card details without triggering an immediate charge. By applying a $0 trial, the card is saved, and payment can then be processed manually via Stripe.

We’ve added some code that should now strip out the "Trial Discount" row from the relevant views. If you happen to see it appear again, please let us know so we can investigate further.

full_threads.body: This ticket has been open for over 5 days. If action is still required, please prioritize it. Otherwise, kindly provide an update - either to confirm it can be closed or if a follow-up with the client is needed.

Hi Jen,

I hope all is well.

We are looking into this, we will update you next week :)
This ticket has been waiting for over 24 hours.

action.text: Joel Maligalig assigned to Joel Maligalig
